content:
The provided chunk is part of a decorator system in Python designed to handle exceptions and log errors. Specifically, this section is within a function that logs error messages when exceptions occur during function execution. The code fits into a broader context of utility functions and decorators being added to the built-in module namespace to enhance debugging and exception handling capabilities.

exceptionLoggedNotify.info(
                            '%s: ERROR IN PRINTING' % f.__name__)
                    raise
            _exceptionLogged.__doc__ = f.__doc__
            return _exceptionLogged
        return _decoratorFunc
